metadata.Title: CVE-2021-20326 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A user authorized to performing a specific type of find query may trigger a denial of service. This issue affects: MongoDB Inc. MongoDB Server v4.4 versions prior to 4.4.4.

criterions.comment: mongodb: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
